page.title: 13EMMA'S PONY
page.content: Each morning my sister gets up and checks the ponies' water and makes sure that they are alright, then she feeds them. My pony is called Bonny. Grooming I groom my pony with a body brush and a curry comb. I pick his feet with a hoof pick and then I oil them. In the winter when he is very dirty I use a dandy brush and a rubber glove. The glove is for getting the hairs out if he is moulting. Riding I ride my pony for at least 2 hours every day to get him fit. I ride him all over this area, cantering on grass and trotting. I jump as many safe ditches as I can plus logs and hedges. If I'm riding alone I ride him in the paddock.
